spiritual_invitation: üôè Welcome to Rameshwaram, the sacred southern shore where Lord Rama worshipped Lord Shiva before his victorious journey to Lanka. Here, the great streams of Vaishnavism and Shaivism unite in divine harmony. Stand where Rama stood, bathe in the waters blessed by his presence, and receive the grace that prepared an avatar for victory. The 22 sacred wells await to purify you completely.

blessings.title: Complete Purification
blessings.blessing: May the 22 sacred theerthas wash away all sins and purify you for spiritual advancement
blessings.significance: The 22 wells draw from different sacred rivers. Bathing in all of them purifies different aspects of karma and heals various ailments.
blessings.experience: Complete the full circuit of 22 wells before entering the main sanctum for darshan

blessings.title: Char Dham Merit
blessings.blessing: May your visit fulfill your Char Dham yatra if you have completed the other three dhams
blessings.significance: Rameshwaram is the southern pillar of the Char Dham. Completing it with the others is one of Hinduism's greatest spiritual achievements.
blessings.experience: Carry water from the northern dhams to offer here, or carry sacred items from here to the north

blessings.title: Ancestral Liberation
blessings.blessing: May your ancestors attain peace and liberation through the rites performed at this sacred site
blessings.significance: Rameshwaram is one of India's most potent sites for ancestral rites. Shraddha here liberates souls across generations.
blessings.experience: Perform Shraddha or offer pindas at Agni Theertham beach

pilgrimage_blessing: As you leave Rameshwaram, the southernmost sacred land of Bharat, carry with you the grace of both Shiva and Rama. The waters of 22 theerthas have purified you; the corridors of stone have walked you through mythology; and the view of Ram Setu has reminded you of the possible.
